modal.description: Add a new race to your world
modal.info_message: Everything can be edited later. Start with the basic information and add details as you develop your story.
modal.summary_placeholder: Majestic creatures with red scales and ability to manipulate flames. They live in volcanic mountains and are known for their ancestral wisdom.
modal.race_views_description: Here you can record how other races, peoples, and civilizations view this race. This adds depth to worldbuilding by showing different cultural perspectives and prejudices.
modal.no_races_for_views: You need to create other races first to add views. Create this race and then add views by editing it.
modal.view_description_placeholder: How Elves see Fire Dragons: dangerous but noble creatures, guardians of ancient secrets.
modal.cultural_notes_placeholder: Describe rites, taboos, and curiosities about this race. For example: sacred rituals, forbidden practices, interesting facts about their culture and customs.
modal.rite_placeholder: Coming of age ritual where young dragons must dive into lava to prove their resistance.
modal.taboo_placeholder: It is forbidden to use fire against members of the same lineage under penalty of eternal exile.
modal.curiosity_placeholder: Dragon scales change color according to mood, becoming brighter when they are happy.
modal.general_appearance_placeholder: Massive reptilian body covered in crimson scales that glow like living embers. Immense wings that generate intense heat when flapping.
modal.special_physical_characteristics_placeho: Horns that store magical energy, claws reinforced with volcanic crystals, eyes that see in the infrared spectrum.
modal.social_organization_placeholder: Live in hierarchical clans led by the oldest and wisest dragon. Each clan controls a specific volcanic territory.
modal.other_cycle_placeholder: Describe how members of this race reproduce...
modal.other_communication_placeholder: Describe how members of this race communicate...
modal.physical_capacity_description: This field is to indicate how dangerous an average member of this race is (without anything, including items, clothing, etc.) compared to an average human in your story.
modal.special_characteristics_placeholder: Absolute control over fire and heat, ability to fly at high altitudes, natural resistance to all types of thermal damage.
modal.weaknesses_placeholder: Vulnerable to ice magic, cannot regulate temperature in aquatic environments, arrogance can be exploited.
modal.story_motivation_placeholder: Represent ancestral power that must be respected. Serve as guardians of forbidden knowledge and epic challenges for heroes.
modal.inspirations_placeholder: Classic dragons from European mythology blended with elements of Asian dragons, inspired by Smaug and D&D dragons.
